s_synopsis: "Ishar - Legend of the Fortress" is the sequel to "Crystals of Arborea". Morgoth and Morgula, the black god and his witch wife who were defeated in the previous game, had a child, Krogh. Their evil progeny is based in the fortress Ishar, which means "unknown" in the elven tongue, and has plans to reduce to population of Kendoria to slavery.
